name: @imbricate/origin-quick-action
description: The Quick Action origin for Imbricate

scripts.release: pnpm lint && pnpm test && pnpm license && pnpm build
scripts.publish-dry-run: pnpm release && cd app && pnpm publish --dry-run --no-git-checks --access=public
scripts.publish: pnpm release && cd app && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access=public

author: WMXPY
